doc.title: Magnetism
doc.plot: A lonesome robot is wandering when suddenly he is hit by a heavy and powerful magnet. It's stuck on his head, but he manages to get it off. A bad start of the day, but not for long. A very attractive girl robot sees him and it's love at first sight. They run to eachother, but when contact is made, the result is disastrous. Both have the same magnetic polarity! Two robots are soon to encounter the powerful characteristics of magnetism. How can this problem be solved?
